abstract: Letter from climate scientists and environmental groups asserts that museums of science and natural history should 'cut all ties' with fossil fuel companies and donors like Koch brothers; says their donations are tainted by their attempts to deny climate change.
lead_paragraph: Donations from fossil fuel companies and others who deny climate change are tainted, a letter from scientists and environmental groups says.

headline.main: Science Museums Urged to Cut Ties With Kochs
headline.print_headline: Science Museums Urged to Cut Ties With Kochs

snippet: Donations from fossil fuel companies and others who deny climate change are tainted, a letter from scientists and environmental groups says.
